title: Businesses are ready for April’s total solar eclipse with celestial-themed doughnuts and beer
description: With the April 8 total solar eclipse right around the corner, U.S. businesses are ready for the celestial event.
keywords: Delta Air Lines Inc, Dayton, Cincinnati, Solar eclipses, Eclipses, OH State Wire, TX State Wire, AP Top News, AR State Wire, NY State Wire, Business, f, a, n, Science
snippet:
NEW YORK (AP) — Eclipse-themed beer. Jewelry and ornaments. And doughnuts that capture the sun’s disappearing act with the help of buttercream frosting.
